captions.text: Officer Kong
Is Shin okay?
I think he was stressed by what happened
He’s showing signs of nausea
Are you okay?
Throwing up is really bad for your health
Why do you care?
I’m sorry
I’m so sorry
I won’t ask for a divorce anymore

And I won’t talk about 
leaving the Palace either

I was able to breathe in the Palace 
because of you
So I want to stay by your side
From the way things are going, I might get kicked out of being the Crown Prince, then…
I don’t love you because you’re the Crown Prince.  I love you just as you are
What?
What did you just say?
That I love you

I think my heart aches this much 
because I love you

If you stay by my side, 
I might break your wings
I don’t care

Just tell me that you want me 
to stay by your side
Stay by my side
Don’t leave me
Don’t leave me alone
People are calling me an arsonist

But lying down like this makes me 
feel like nothing happened

Since you’re innocent, the truth will come 
out in the end if we just wait
If I get kicked out of being the Crown Prince, you might have to bring home the bacon
Fine, you can do the housework
I’ll bring in the dough
Men are not supposed to do housework!

Who knows?
You might enjoy it
Hi!
How come you didn’t pick up the phone?

I had to clean the house and 
put the kids to bed
This is what you call cleaning?

I thought I did a good job
You don’t like it?

- Where are the kids?
- They’re sleeping

If you get a job for yourself, 
you’ll know just hard it is to work

- I know, I know
- What’s that sound?

Huh?
They’re awake

Oh my little babies
Mommy’s here
Did you miss your mommy?

- Did daddy read to you?
- Mommy’s here
Mommy Mommy
What’s that smell?

Not again!
Hurry up!
There’s a fire

- The gas range
- Stay right here

I can’t believe this
How can I work when the house is a mess?
No way!
You even took a peek at me showering!
No, I didn’t

Besides, I don’t feel anything 
even if I look at you
Really?
You really don’t feel anything?
Nope
Why are you so sloppy?
Are you sure you don’t feel anything?
I wasn’t even thinking about it

But look at you, going ahead 
of yourself  Right?

No, I was just resting my eyes 
because I was tired

I’m gonna go now
Goodnight
Where do you think you’re going?

We need to have a peacemaking 
ceremony before you go
Well, we haven’t made peace in a long time
I guess I can’t just go back like this, huh?
I agree
Let’s shout out The Great Republic of Korea as the Crown Prince

and the Crown Princess representing 
this country!
The Great Republic of Korea!

You didn’t even do this 
during the last World Cup, huh?
This is the goal ceremony representing Korea
Let’s give a shout out for the World Cup!
The Great Republic of Korea!
The Great Republic of Korea!
Do you take me for a fool?

The Great Republic of Korea!
Of course I’ve done this
